title: 273 - Emma Goldman
itunes:title: #273 - Emma Goldman
description: She was dubbed the "most dangerous woman in America" in her time, but who exactly was Emma Goldman and what did she believe? This week, Connor and Dan dive back into the pool of American anarchism to learn about Goldman's early feminism, fiery speeches, and violent tactics. Was she right about a lot of stuff? Yup. Did she have her problems? You bet. Do I regret putting so many questions in this description? You know it.
